steps.title: Step 1: Schedule Your Pickup
steps.description: Call or book online for a convenient appointment.

steps.title: Step 2: Get a Free Quote
steps.description: Upfront, no-obligation pricing with no hidden fees.

steps.title: Step 3:  We Do the Heavy Lifting
steps.description: Our team removes and loads everything for you.

steps.title: Step 4: Eco-Friendly Disposal
steps.description: We recycle, donate, and dispose of junk responsibly.
